testimonials.quote: The UCIL Impact Portal made it easy for me to report the contaminated water issue in our village. Within days, officials visited and replaced the hand pump.
testimonials.name: Ramesh Munda

testimonials.quote: We were facing frequent health issues. After raising a grievance through this portal, UCIL organized a free medical camp in our area.
testimonials.name: Sunita Devi

testimonials.quote: For years, no one listened to our problems. But after using this portal, the district officer personally called us to understand the situation.
testimonials.name: Babli Soren

testimonials.quote: I reported our compensation delay through this platform. To my surprise, I received an official letter within 10 days.
testimonials.name: Mahesh Kumar

testimonials.quote: There was uranium waste leaking near our crops. With the portal, we submitted photos and a report. UCIL sent an inspection team immediately.
testimonials.name: Kiran Kisku
